item.title: Mû, a board game with five elements
item.description: Available in HTML5 Godot being amazing, I exported an HTML5 build of the game that you can run in your web browser. Play the HTML5 Demo The Rules of Mû You win by achieving any of the following: Reach the top of the opponent’s hill. Capture both the opponent’s priests. Capture all the opponent’s pawns. Movement Pawns and priests move alike, to one of the three tiles in front of them, if it is on the board and not already occupied by another pawn.
